content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: USUBJID
      operator: empty
    - name: POOLID
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.36
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when both USUBJID and POOLID are empty
Outcome:
  Message: Both USUBJID and POOID are empty
  Output Variables:
    - USUBJID
    - POOLID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '36'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The unique subject identifier (USUBJID) or pool identifier
                  (POOLID) is Required in all datasets containing subject-level or
                  pool-level data, respectively.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Section: 4.2.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
      - FINDINGS
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when both USUBJID and POOLID are empty

Outcome.Message: Both USUBJID and POOID are empty

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The unique subject identifier (USUBJID) or pool identifier (POOLID) is Required in all datasets containing subject-level or pool-level data, respectively.
